nodeList.description: Hold ability key to channel to increase the area. When you release, combine all of your minions in the area into a single hulking abomination with states based on which minions are consumed.
Your abomination has more health (multiplicative with other modifiers).

node.description: Hold ability key to channel to increase the area. When you release, combine all of your minions in the area into a single hulking abomination with states based on which minions are consumed.

nodeList.description:
Your abomination grants additional armor to nearby minions for each minion it consumed.

When your abomination dies this effect is also granted to your minions by its corpse.
